column2: Arrange a prisoner exchange for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. If the ruler holding [Root.GetObjectPronoun] prisoner accepts, a member of his dynasty will be released from your dungeons in exchange.
column6: Dispones un intercambio de prisioneros por [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Si su captor acepta el intercambio, un miembro de su dinastía será liberado de nuestras mazmorras.
